root.email_html:
Dear 166564362 ,
Thanks for registering in Doreenbeads.com. Your account on our website has been successfully created.
the following is your account information:
--------------------
Registered email address:166564362@qq.com
You could enjoy the following benefits now.
1. A special registration coupon with par value of USD 6.01 has been sent to your account. When the total product price reaches USD 30, you could Use it in the process of CHECKOUT.
2. Get Single Order Discount 
Just place your orders freely; the discount will be taken at checkout automatically.

Total Product Price

(Only for regular-priced items)

Discount

3. When the total amount of your previous orders is up to USD 200, our system will automatically add you to our VIP group. VIP discount will be applied according our VIP policy.
4. Learn more about Payment Methods or Shipping.

For help with any of our online service, please contact us by:
1. Click "Live Chat" on our website main page;
2. or Email us at sale@doreenbeads.com



Best regards,
Doreenbeads Team
